name: mais-horas-database-manager
description: Sistema inteligente de monitoramento e backup de bancos de dados Neon

scripts.status: node -e "const Scheduler = require('./core/scheduler'); const s = new Scheduler(); s.getSystemReport().then(console.log)"
scripts.backup: node -e "const Scheduler = require('./core/scheduler'); const s = new Scheduler(); s.forceBackup().then(r => console.log(r ? '✅ Backup OK' : '❌ Erro'))"
scripts.switch: node -e "const Scheduler = require('./core/scheduler'); const s = new Scheduler(); s.forceDatabaseSwitch().then(r => console.log(r ? '✅ Switch OK' : '❌ Erro'))"
